Kate Yeo (amụrụ n'afọ 2001) bụ onye na-eme ngagharị iwe maka ihu igwe na Singapore

N'afọ 2018, Kate malitere mkpọsa BYO Bottle SG iji kwado megide plastik a na-eji otu ugboro eme ihe na Singapore. Omume a arụwo ọrụ na ụlọ mmanya pụkụ abụọ na ịrị atọ na otu ma rute ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mmadụ pụkụ ịrị. O nwetakwara ihe nrite nke abụọ na Goi Peace Foundation International Essay Contest for Young People maka edemede ya akpọrọ "Agha megide mmetọ plastik".

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ahazi We The Planet climate strikes maka Earth Day 2020. Mgbe ahụ, o guzobere Re-Earth Initiative, otu NGO nke ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi na mba ụwa na-agba mbọ ime ka onye ọ bụla nwee ike ịnweta usoro ihu igwe. O nyekwara aka ịhazi Virtual Youth Environment Assembly, nke U.N

N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, ọ bụ onye nnọchiteanya na Othering & Belonging Summit, n'akụkụ onye edemede na onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe Naomi Klein na ndị ọzọ na-akwado ndị ntorobịa Tokata Iron Eyes, Xiye Bastida na Samia Dumbuya.
Kate ekwuola okwu nke ọma banyere mkpa ọ dị itinye ndị ntorobịa ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia n'ime mgbanwe ihu igwe.
N'oge ọrịa a, Kate malitere atụmatụ iji kwado ndị na-ere ahịa na Singapore
Ezinụlọ ya zụrụ ọtụtụ mmadụ nri na ihe ọṅụṅụ nke e nyere ndị bi n'ụlọ ọkara.
